metadata.title: CVE-2024-57903 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: restrict SO_REUSEPORT to inet socketsAfter blamed commit, crypto sockets could accidentally be destroyedfrom RCU call back, as spotted by zyzbot [1].Trying to acquire a mutex in RCU callback is not allowed.Restrict SO_REUSEPORT socket option to inet sockets.v1 of this patch supported TCP, UDP and SCTP sockets,but fcnal-test.sh test needed RAW and ICMP support.[1]BUG: sleeping function called from invalid context atkernel/locking/mutex.c:562in_atomic(): 1, irqs_disabled(): 0, non_block: 0,
